TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract MailingLabel

span.span: Represents a mailing label.

para.span: 使用 属性返回 对象。

span.span: Use the property to return the object.

para.span: 使用 方法打印 "标签选项" 对话框中 "产品编号" 框中列出的邮件标签。

span.span: Use the method to print a mailing label listed in the Product Number box in the Label Options dialog box.

para.span: 使用 属性可设置或打印自定义邮件标签。

span.span: Use the property to format or print a custom mailing label.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };
member this.Creator : int

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则此属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

.property instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.CustomLabels CustomLabels

summary.span: 返回一个 集合，该集合代表可用的自定义邮件标签。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents the available custom mailing labels.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultLabelName { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultLabelName
Public Property DefaultLabelName As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultLabelName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultLabelName : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置默认邮件标签的名称。

span.span: Returns or sets the name for the default mailing label.

para.span: 要查找指定内置标签的字符串，请在“工具”菜单的“信封和标签”对话框中“标签”选项卡上，单击“选项”按钮，然后在“标签选项”对话框中选择该标签。

span.span: To find the string for the specified built-in label, select the label in the Label Options dialog box (Tools menu, Envelopes and Labels dialog box, Labels tab, Options button).

para.span: 然后单击 "详细信息" 并查看 "标签名称" 框，其中包含要用于此属性的正确字符串。

span.span: Then click Details and look at the Label name box, which contains the correct string to use for this property.

para.span: 若要将自定义标签设置为默认邮件标签，请使用 "详细信息" 对话框中显示的标签名称，或将该 属性与对象一起使用 。

span.span: To set a custom label as the default mailing label, use the label name that appears in the Details dialog box, or use the property with a object.

para.span: 在 CustomLabel 对象中创建的新标签文档自动将 DefaultLabelName 属性设为 CustomLabel 对象的名字。

span.span: Creating a new label document from a CustomLabel object automatically sets the DefaultLabelName property to the name of the CustomLabel object.

summary.span: 返回或设置装有打印邮件标签纸张的默认纸盒。

span.span: Returns or sets the default paper tray that contains sheets of mailing labels.

para.span: DefaultLaserTray属性可以是 常量之一。

span.span: The DefaultLaserTray property can be one of the constants.

summary.span: 如此如果默认情况下，将 POSTNET 条码添加到信封或邮件标签。

span.span: True if a POSTNET bar code is added to envelopes or mailing labels by default.
For U.S. mail only.

para.span: 对于信封，在设置该属性之前，必须将此属性设置为True 。

span.span: For envelopes, this property must be set to True before the property is set.

Public Sub LabelOptions ()
public: void LabelOptions();
abstract member LabelOptions : unit -> unit

span.span: Displays the Label Options dialog box.

para.span: LabelOptions 方法只有文档是邮件标签邮件合并主文档。

span.span: The LabelOptions method works only if the document is the main document of a mailing labels mail merge.

The mailing label name.
Optional Object.
The text for the label address.

param.name: ExtractAddress

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 要使用"EnvelopeAddress"书签 (用户定义书签) 作为标签文本标记的文本。

span.span: True to use the text marked by the "EnvelopeAddress" bookmark (a user-defined bookmark) as the label text.

span.span: If this argument is specified, and are ignored.

span.span: The laser printer tray to be used.
Can be any constant.

param.name: SingleLabel

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 要打印单个标签; 假 以打印一整页相同的标签。

span.span: True to print a single label; False to print an entire page of the same label.

param.name: Row

Not valid if is False.

param.name: Column

param.name: Vertical

span.span: Used for Asian-language mailing labels.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Vertical { get; set; }
.property instance bool Vertical
Public Property Vertical As Boolean
public: property bool Vertical { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Vertical : bool with get, set

summary.span: 对亚洲信封和邮件标签上的文本垂直方向为 True 。

span.span: True vertically orients text on Asian envelopes and mailing labels.

para.span: 此属性仅适用于为邮件合并设置的邮件标签或信封，并且仅适用于亚洲语言。

span.span: This property works only with mailing labels or envelopes that are set up for a mail merge and applies only to Asian languages.
